description:
Previous (human) life of Lian Shuang. She is the twin of Lian Luo.
The major diffrence when both are human is color of dress, the Lian Shuang wear pink dress and their sister whear blue dress, also can be distinguished by the hairstyle - Lian Shuang have two hairbun, where Lian Lue have only one, but Lian Shuang sometimes pretend her sister and change her hairstyle to one hairbun, but still wear pink dress.
name: Lian Shuang
